file.name: LocalCrossReference.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  title: 'test'
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /entities:
    get:
      summary: 'Get entities'
      responses:
        200:
          description: 'Returns entity in JSON'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                minItems: 1
                maxItems: 1
                items:
                  $ref: '#/paths/~1entities~1%7Bid%7D/get/responses/200/content/application~1json/schema'
  /entities/{id}:
    parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
    get:
      summary: 'Get entity by id'
      responses:
        200:
          description: 'Returns entity in JSON'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - key
                properties:
                  key:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - value

Error: parse: paths: /entities: get: : responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: item: parse schema: reference "#/paths/~1entities~1%7Bid%7D/get/responses/200/content/application~1json/schema": resolve reference "#/paths/~1entities~1%7Bid%7D/get/responses/200/content/application~1json/schema": invalid schema reference "#/paths/~1entities~1%7Bid%7D/get/responses/200/content/application~1json/schema"
